top_comments.comment: Nowadays you don't tell your sons to not be a girl. You tell them don't be a boy pretending to be a girl

I am a man.  I teach my son as I was taught.  The rules real men live by as you said: don't bully people, don't beat your wife or kids.  Be brave, be honest, be true to who you are.
